physics_actors.description: [actor] The list of physics actors to enable when destruction happens.

trail_effect_path.description: [particles] The particle effect to be attached as a trail on each debris actor.

impulse.description: The multiplier on the direction vector(including random unit vector multiplied by the random direction weight) applied as an impulse on the actor.

random_direction_weight.description: The multiplier on the random unit vector that is added on the direction from the center of the unit to the actor

visibility_group.description: [string] The visibility group to show at the start and hide when the debris actor decay
